resp = client.esql.async_query(
    format="json",
    body={
        "query": "\n    FROM cluster_one:my-index*,cluster_two:logs*\n    | STATS COUNT(http.response.status_code) BY user.id\n    | LIMIT 2\n  ",
        "include_ccs_metadata": True
    },
)
print(resp)
